entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Building Corelib in runtime triggers several asserts #63348
    17.6
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33417.173 #66943
  • Generate class - Invalid class generated #40605
    Backlog
  • Double clicking error in error list with file it is referencing closed does not open the file #40721
    Backlog
  • Remote exception handling (removing SoftCrashException) #40476
    Backlog
  • Use Implicit Type refactoring may break nullability #40594
    Backlog
  • VS 16.5.0 Preview 1.0 - AccessViolationException #40573
    Backlog
  • Show the block declaration when locating the matching bracket via Ctrl+] #40567
    Backlog
  • Need GetRequiredOperation helper #40505
    Backlog
  • VB.Net nullable enum intellisense not suggesting the enum #40498
    Backlog
  • Format align chain method calls in different lines #40343
    Backlog
  • intellisense explicit cast vs dot #40217
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditorBasedFixAllProvider encoutered an error - NullReferenceException #40031
    Backlog
  • New PCL project wizard in VS uses dnxcore50 when ASP.NET Core 1.0 is checked #11823
    Backlog
  • System.AggregateException with innerException "A task was cancelled" trying to add reference to certain projects of a solution #13802
    Backlog
  • Use RHS info to suggest replacement names for `var` #17988
    Backlog
  • IDE0019 should match is/cast #39860
    Backlog
  • Line of code becomes too indented when deleting a preceeding blank line #39843
    Backlog
  • Using a constant interpolated string literal in ObsoleteAttribute changes behavior #66938
  • Inline hints display incorrect nullability when NRT's enabled #66937
  • Refactoring to introduce deconstructed local variable #39537
    Backlog
  • Format on Paste inserts two blank lines for every line of /// doc comments when newlines are only \r #546
    Backlog
  • Pasting code in front of Xml doc comments caused strange indentation. #2585
    Backlog
  • Call to non-existant Add() overload in collection initializer shows lambda completions #3522
    Backlog
  • MetadataAsSource doesn't regenerate files after formatting change #4206
    Backlog
  • C# snippet completion does not work above using directives #4606
    Backlog
  • Distinguish linked files in quick info #5349
    Backlog
  • Auto brace completion should support adding open brace when close brace is typed. #5497
    Backlog
  • Extract interface suggestions #5750
    Backlog
  • Interactive: Signature help not classified #6681
    Backlog
  • Preview Changes takes too long to classify when checkboxes #6722
    Backlog
  • Target type preselection: consider base types/implementations #6942
    Backlog
  • C# completion: preselect True and False for target typing #7122
    Backlog
  • Encapsulate field should preserve Unicode-escaped field names when possible. #7576
    Backlog
  • The C# identifier rename operation is not accepting "@" as a permissible character in an identifier #8118
    Backlog
  • Xml doc probably should follow the generated property after encapsulating field #8310
    Backlog
  • Auto completion should not propose a module or not newable type after new or as new #8311
    Backlog
  • Intellisense filtering with no matches is worse than Dev12 #8330
    Backlog
  • XML doc comment completion is case sensitive #8628
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio is missing the word completion function #9300
    Backlog
  • Conflicts resolved during rename should be formatted if appropriate. #10406
    Backlog
  • QuickInfo incorrectly assumes mouse position and cursor are in same context #10482
    Backlog
  • Allow to Switch Back to VS2013 Style XML Comment Outlining #10937
    Backlog
  • Transferring a document to Misc files loses all C# intellisense #11599
    Backlog

Updated

  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.workspaces.workspacesnetcore.projectproperties (vs2022) #64672
    17.5 P3
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.csharp.csharperrorlistnetcore.errorlist #61367
    17.6 P3
  • [New API] stackalloc in IOperation #66833
  • Code folding disappears in ASMX files #22583
    Backlog
  • Unify editorconfig parsers #40774
    Backlog
  • BasicArgumentProvider.ImplicitArgumentSwitching is flaky #66533
    17.6
  • Default parameter value binding to property instead of type name (i.e. Color Color problem) #40045
    Backlog
  • Adjust SymbolDisplay member options behavior for interface members #66753
  • newintegrationtests.csharp.csharpaddmissingreference.verifyavailablecodeactions (vs2022) #64807
  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
    17.5
  • WorkCoordinatorTests.AdditionalDocumentOpenedClosedEvents is flaky #64047
    17.5
  • local introduce variable is very inconsistent #39806
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers warns that I should be using version 7.0.0; but there isn't a release version of 7.0.0 yet #65581
  • roslyn.visualstudio.newintegrationtests.visualbasic.basicargumentprovider.fullcycle is flaky #66596
    17.6
  • turn on CA1825 once roslyn-analyzer moves to new IOperation API #20864
    Backlog
  • flow into dotnet/runtime main blocked #66900
  • C# Task List doesn't display items #66872
  • Navigation to errors in files generated by a source generator in Roslyn from build output doesn't work in VS #66928
  • Behavior of "var" quickinfo and nullable reference types #63959
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "using aliases for any types" #56323
    C# 12.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4] Custom class "Windows" result to its elements cannot be recognized in .NET 8.0 #66888
  • The analyzer assembly references version '4.6.0.0' of the compiler, which is newer than the currently running version '4.5.0.0' #66918

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix how we classify a dotted constructor call in find-refs #66942
    Area-IDE
  • Parse parameter list on an interface in error recovery mode #66940
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #66936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Parameterize tests in VisualStudioOptionStorageTests #66935
    Area-IDE
  • Update build.sh #66933
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

Merged

  • Do not suggest to remove discard, if it can lead to a compiler error #66879
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Infer better base types in 'generate type' #66941
    Area-IDE, Next
  • WithFrozenPartialSemantics freezing linked documents #66904
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix OnInitialized #66747
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure that files added are immediately hooked up to open buffers #66550
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Optimize checks in AnalyzerExecutor #66923
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Improve 'introduce variable for expression' when using tuples #66909
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use WhereAsArray to avoid allocations in all/none cases #66922
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • EnC: Avoid loading DiaSymReader unless Windows PDB is actually read #66901
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lsp_configuration #66944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add more using-alias-to-type tests #66889
    Area-Compilers
  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Add 'ExpandValueTuple' as a misc symbol display flag #66929
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow LSP code action requests to set the (new) AllowGenerateInHiddenCode option #66917
    Area-IDE
  • Provide access to F# integration tests #66926
    Area-IDE
  • Fix workspace pull diagnostics #66886
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options to editorconfig like name #66899
    Area-IDE
  • Clean with authority #66925
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use next sibling in SyntaxNode.GetChildPosition() if available #66876
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • SymbolDisplay show modifiers for default interface implementations and static abstract members #66712
    Area-Compilers
  • Clean and rename FeatureOnOffOptions #66881
    Area-IDE
  • Update Program.cs #66931
    Area-Compilers, Community
